languages.text: "Я не понимаю". {n}Сенешаль сокрушенно качает головой.{/n} "Версериан верой и правдой служат династии Вольного Торговца, из поколения в поколение... Нелегко в этом признаться, но эта новость просто сокрушила меня".

"I cannot comprehend it." {n}The Seneschal shakes his head helplessly.{/n} "The Werserians have served the Rogue Trader dynasty loyally for generations... This is hard to admit, but the news has come as a crushing blow."
languages.original_text: "Я не понимаю". {n}Сенешаль сокрушенно качает головой.{/n} "Версериан верой и правдой служат династии Вольного Торговца, из поколения в поколение... Нелегко в этом признаться, но эта новость просто сокрушила меня".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot comprehend it." {n}The Seneschal shakes his head ruefully.{/n} "The Werserians have served the Rogue Trader dynasty loyally for generations... This is hard to admit, but I am simply crushed by the news."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I cannot comprehend it." {n}The Seneschal shakes his head helplessly.{/n} "The Werserians have served the Rogue Trader dynasty loyally for generations... This is hard to admit, but the news has come as a crushing blow."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我简直无法理解。”{n}阿贝拉德悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“韦尔森家族世世代代忠于行商浪人王朝……虽然我很不愿意承认，但这个消息简直要把我压垮了。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot comprehend it." {n}The Seneschal shakes his head helplessly.{/n} "The Werserians have served the Rogue Trader dynasty loyally for generations... This is hard to admit, but the news has come as a crushing blow."

traits.locale_text: “我简直无法理解。”{n}阿贝拉德悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“韦尔森家族世世代代忠于行商浪人王朝……虽然我很不愿意承认，但这个消息简直要把我压垮了。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kann es nicht begreifen." {n}Der Truchsess schüttelt hilflos den Kopf.{/n} "Die Werserians dienen der Freihändler-Dynastie seit Generationen äußerst loyal ... Es ist schwer, das einzugestehen, doch diese Nachricht hat mich erschüttert."
languages.original_text: "I cannot comprehend it." {n}The Seneschal shakes his head helplessly.{/n} "The Werserians have served the Rogue Trader dynasty loyally for generations... This is hard to admit, but the news has come as a crushing blow."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann es nicht begreifen." {n}Der Truchsess schüttelt bedauernd den Kopf.{/n} "Die Werserians dienen der Freihändler-Dynastie seit Generationen äußerst loyal ... Es ist schwer, das einzugestehen, doch diese Nachricht erschüttert mich schlicht."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No logro comprenderlo». {n}El senescal menea la cabeza, impotente.{/n} «Los Werserian han servido fielmente y durante generaciones a esta dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes... Me cuesta admitirlo, pero la noticia ha supuesto un duro golpe».
languages.original_text: "I cannot comprehend it." {n}The Seneschal shakes his head helplessly.{/n} "The Werserians have served the Rogue Trader dynasty loyally for generations... This is hard to admit, but the news has come as a crushing blow."

traits.locale_text: «No logro comprenderlo». {n}El senescal menea la cabeza apesadumbrado.{/n} «Los Werserian han servido fielmente y durante generaciones a esta dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes... Me cuesta admitirlo, pero la noticia me ha dejado de piedra».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le sénéchal secoue la tête d'un air triste.{/n} « Si je le savais ! Depuis des générations, les Werserian servent la dynastie des libres-marchands avec une loyauté inébranlable... C'est difficile à admettre, mais je suis atterré par cette nouvelle. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot comprehend it." {n}The Seneschal shakes his head helplessly.{/n} "The Werserians have served the Rogue Trader dynasty loyally for generations... This is hard to admit, but the news has come as a crushing blow."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sénéchal secoue la tête d'un air triste.{/n} « Si je le savais ! Depuis des générations, les Werserian servent la dynastie des libres-marchands avec une loyauté inébranlable... C'est difficile à admettre, mais je suis atterré par cette nouvelle. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「私には理解できません」{n}家令長は残念そうに首を振る。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家は何世代にもわたってローグトレーダー王朝に忠実に仕えてきました…認めがたいことですが、私はこの知らせにただ打ちひしがれています」
languages.original_text: "I cannot comprehend it." {n}The Seneschal shakes his head helplessly.{/n} "The Werserians have served the Rogue Trader dynasty loyally for generations... This is hard to admit, but the news has come as a crushing blow."

traits.locale_text: 「私には理解できません」{n}家令長は残念そうに首を振る。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家は何世代にもわたってローグトレーダー王朝に忠実に仕えてきました...。認めがたいことですが、私はこの知らせにただ打ちひしがれています」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ben de anlayamıyorum." {n}Seneşal, çaresizce başını sallıyor.{/n} "Werserian Hanesi, Hür Tacir hanedanlığına asırlardır sadakatle hizmet etmiştir. Kabullenmekte zorlanıyorum, bu haber beni yıktı geçti."
languages.original_text: "I cannot comprehend it." {n}The Seneschal shakes his head helplessly.{/n} "The Werserians have served the Rogue Trader dynasty loyally for generations... This is hard to admit, but the news has come as a crushing blow."

traits.locale_text: "Ben de anlayamıyorum." {n}Seneşal, çaresizce başını sallıyor.{/n} "Werserian Hanesi, Hür Tacir hanedanlığına asırlardır sadakatle hizmet etti. Kabullenmekte zorlanıyorum, bu haberler beni yıktı geçti."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
